posts.post_content:
Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards (see posts in T206, 30's and 50's for more offerings!). 

"I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

All prices are net to me and include shipping. PPFF preferred.

T205 Tris Speaker HOF - Honest Long Cut - SGC 3 - $750 Now $OLD
T202 Tris Speaker/Smokey Joe Wood/Close at Third - Hassan back - SGC 5.5 - $1,100 Now $OLD

Please PM if interested.


Thanks for looking!
